definition: puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Where's the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked?
sentences.chinese: 那么彼德派捏起的泡菜在什么地方？

sentences.english: More concerning is the presence of additives in some types of commercially prepared kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 更让人担忧的是韩国泡菜中的食品添加剂。

sentences.english: This is kimchi. My Korean classmate made it. Wanna try some?
sentences.chinese: 这是我班上韩国同学做的泡菜。要不要吃吃看？

sentences.english: This is kimchi. My Korean classmate made it.
sentences.chinese: 这是我班上韩国同学做的泡菜。

sentences.english: Shield and Heraldic Mail with Surcoat show your custom banner.
sentences.chinese: 泡菜里那个定义旗帜的功能。

sentences.english: That's served with a roll and pickle.
Do you like kimchi ? It's my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢韩国泡菜吗﹖是我的最爱。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a U-shaped pickle jar which is a container for cooking pickles.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种制做泡菜的容器，即泡菜坛。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a U-shaped pickle jar which is a container for cooking pickles.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种制做泡菜的容器，即泡菜坛。

sentences.english: I had a pastrami on rye with a bit of mustard and some pickles.
sentences.chinese: 我点了稞麦面包夹熏牛肉，加了芥末和泡菜。

sentences.english: At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic.
sentences.chinese: 用饭的时候，德国泡菜味和大蒜味争相散发。

sentences.english: Wheres the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked?
sentences.chinese: 那么彼德派捏起的泡菜在哪儿？

sentences.english: Kimchi is the soul of the meals, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 泡菜，是韩国餐食的灵魂。

sentences.english: Kimchi has been previously rated one the world's top 5 healthiest foods.
sentences.chinese: 韩国泡菜最近被评为了世界五佳健康食品之一。

sentences.english: Not to mention the perfect pal for your drinking needs is not far from a pork and kimchi stir-fry.
sentences.chinese: 当然用蛋包配上泡菜炒猪肉绝对是下酒菜的新宠儿。

sentences.english: I need a jar to make the krauts.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一个坛子做泡菜。

definition: gimbap (Korean rice roll similar in appearance to sushi)/kimbap
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
